verses.verse: Praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord! <S%H3050><s%> For it is good <S%H2896><s%> to sing <S%H2167><s%> praises <S%H2167><s%> to our God; <S%H430><s%> For it is pleasant <S%H5273><s%> [and] praise <S%H8416><s%> is becoming. <S%H5000><s%>
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> builds <S%H1129><s%> up Jerusalem; <S%H3389><s%> He gathers <S%H3664><s%> the outcasts <S%H5080><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>
He heals <S%H7495><s%> the brokenhearted, <S%H7665><s%> <S%H3820><s%> And binds <S%H2280><s%> up their wounds. <S%H6094><s%>
He counts <S%H4487><s%> the number <S%H4557><s%> of the stars; <S%H3556><s%> He gives <S%H7121><s%> names <S%H8034><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> of them.
Great <S%H1419><s%> is our Lord, <S%H136><s%> and abundant <S%H7227><s%> in strength; <S%H3581><s%> His understanding <S%H8394><s%> is infinite. <S%H369><s%> <S%H4557><s%>
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> supports <S%H9388><s%> the afflicted; <S%H6035><s%> He brings <S%H8213><s%> down <S%H8213><s%> the wicked <S%H7563><s%> to the ground. <S%H776><s%>
Sing <S%H9420><s%> to the Lord <S%H3068><s%> with thanksgiving; <S%H8426><s%> Sing <S%H2167><s%> praises <S%H2167><s%> to our God <S%H430><s%> on the lyre, <S%H3658><s%>

Who covers <S%H3680><s%> the heavens <S%H8064><s%> with clouds, <S%H5645><s%> Who provides <S%H3559><s%> rain <S%H4306><s%> for the earth, <S%H776><s%> Who makes grass <S%H2682><s%> to grow <S%H6779><s%> on the mountains. <S%H2022><s%>
He gives <S%H5414><s%> to the beast <S%H929><s%> its food, <S%H3899><s%> [And] to the young <S%H1121><s%> ravens <S%H6158><s%> which <S%H834><s%> cry. <S%H7121><s%>
He does not delight <S%H2654><s%> in the strength <S%H1369><s%> of the horse; <S%H5483><s%> He does not take <S%H7521><s%> pleasure <S%H7521><s%> in the legs <S%H7785><s%> of a man. <S%H376><s%>
The Lord <S%H3068><s%> favors <S%H7521><s%> those who fear <S%H3372><s%> Him, Those who wait <S%H3176><s%> for His lovingkindness. <S%H2617><s%>
Praise <S%H9576><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> O Jerusalem! <S%H3389><s%> Praise <S%H1984><s%> your God, <S%H430><s%> O Zion! <S%H6726><s%>
For He has strengthened <S%H2388><s%> the bars <S%H1280><s%> of your gates; <S%H8179><s%> He has blessed <S%H1288><s%> your sons <S%H1121><s%> within <S%H7130><s%> you.
He makes <S%H7760><s%> peace <S%H7965><s%> in your borders; <S%H1366><s%> He satisfies <S%H7646><s%> you with the finest <S%H2459><s%> of the wheat. <S%H2406><s%>
He sends <S%H7971><s%> forth His command <S%H565><s%> to the earth; <S%H776><s%> His word <S%H1697><s%> runs <S%H7323><s%> very <S%H5704><s%> swiftly. <S%H4120><s%>
He gives <S%H5414><s%> snow <S%H7950><s%> like wool; <S%H6785><s%> He scatters <S%H6340><s%> the frost <S%H9214><s%> like ashes. <S%H665><s%>
He casts <S%H7993><s%> forth His ice <S%H7140><s%> as fragments; <S%H6595><s%> Who <S%H4310><s%> can stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> His cold <S%H7135><s%>?
He sends <S%H7971><s%> forth His word <S%H1697><s%> and melts <S%H4529><s%> them; He causes His wind <S%H7307><s%> to blow <S%H5380><s%> and the waters <S%H4325><s%> to flow. <S%H5140><s%>
He declares <S%H5046><s%> His words <S%H1697><s%> to Jacob, <S%H3290><s%> His statutes <S%H2706><s%> and His ordinances <S%H4941><s%> to Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

He has not dealt <S%H6213><s%> thus <S%H3651><s%> with any <S%H3605><s%> nation; <S%H1471><s%> And as for His ordinances, <S%H4941><s%> they have not known <S%H3045><s%> them. Praise <S%H1984><s%> the Lord! <S%H3050><s%>
